Name: Starport
Description:
Air unit production facilities .

Allow:
- Sky Fury
- Liberator
- Raven

Root.Tooltip:
Durable support flyer. Loaded with strong anti-capital air missiles. Can switch into Assault Mode to attack ground units.

Can attack air units.
Root.Name: Build Viking

Root.Tooltip: Air Transport Unit. Can heal nearby Colony Guardians. Can use Ignite Afterburners.
Root.Name: Train Medivac

Root.Tooltip:
Dominion Air Support Unit. Can deploy Auto-Turret, Point Defense Drone, and Seeker Missile.

Detection unit
Root.Name: Build Raven

Root.Tooltip:
Tactical strike aircraft, can be invisible.

Can attack the ground.
Root.Name: Build Banshee

Root.Tooltip:
Powerful warship. Can use Yamato Cannon and Tactical Jump.

Can attack ground and air units.
Root.Name: Build Battlecruiser

Root.Tooltip: Sends constructed units to the designated point. Workers rallied to resources will begin gathering automatically.
Root.Name: Set Rally Point

Root.Tooltip:
Air Unit Research Structure. Tech Lab can be combined with any production building.

Allow:
-Raven
-Build Fusion Core to unlock Pride of Augustgrad
Root.Name: Build Tech Lab

Root.Tooltip: Allows 2 units to be created simultaneously.
Root.Name: Build Reactor

Root.Tooltip: Transforms structure into a slow air unit for redeployment. May not produce units, research upgrades, or use abilities until it has landed.
Root.Name: Lift Off

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Selects the unit constructing this structure.
Root.Name: Select Builder

Root.Tooltip:
Empire's new heavy artillery fighter,loaded with missiles that can cause range damage to enemy air units, and can change to protection mode to provide siege firepower.

Can attack air unit.
Root.Name: Build Liberator

Root.Tooltip:
Aerial support unit. Can use Irradiate and Nano-Repair abilities.

Detector
Root.Name: Build Science Vessel

Root.Tooltip: Enables additional unit construction options and allows 2 units to be created simultaneously.
Root.Name: Build Tech Reactor

Root.Tooltip: Enables additional unit construction options and allows 2 units to be created simultaneously.
Root.Name: Build Tech Reactor

Root.Tooltip: High Mobility Air Unit. Good at raid and anti-air strike. **Can attack the ground and air**
Root.Name: Build Wraith

Root.Tooltip:
Deploys 2 Raid Liberators.Elite artillery fighter. Loaded with missiles that deal area damage to enemy air targets. Can switch into Defender Mode to provide siege support.

Can attack air units.
Root.Name: Deploy Raid Liberators

Root.Tooltip:
Adds a Twin Gatling Cannon to Hercules.

Can attack air and ground units.
Root.Name: Militarized Hercules

Root.Tooltip: This unit unlocks at Commander Level 6.
Root.Name: Build Battlecruiser

Root.Tooltip:
Deploys 1 Raven Type-II.Prototype aerial support unit. Can use Railgun Turret, Bio-Mechanical Repair Drone, and Predator Missile.

Detector
Root.Name: Deploy Raven Type-II

Root.Tooltip: Air transport. Heals nearby biological units. Can use Afterburners.
Root.Name: Build Dropship

Root.Tooltip: Mastery: Units deployed from this structure gain 0.0% attack speed.
Root.Name: Combat Mastery

Root.Tooltip:
Raynor trains combat units and builds Barracks 50% faster.
Mechanical units cost 20% less gas.
Stimpack grants increased bonuses, costs less life, and does not require research.
Root.Name: Army Rapid Recruitment

Root.Tooltip: Mastery: Units deployed from this structure regenerate 0.0 life per second while out of combat.
Root.Name: Endurance Training

Root.Tooltip:
Raynor trains combat units and builds Barracks 50% faster.
Mechanical units cost 20% less gas.
Stimpack grants increased bonuses, costs less life, and does not require research.
Root.Name: Vespene Efficiency Assembling

Root.Tooltip: Barracks, Factory, and Starport units are delivered directly to the structure’s Rally Point.
Root.Name: Orbital Drop-Pods

Root.Tooltip:
Mengsk's Elite Viking Squad. Fortified fire power supportive air unit, equiped with powerful anti-capital ship missiles. Can transform to assault mode to attack ground units.

Can attack air.
Root.Name: Build Sky Fury

Root.Tooltip:
Air Support Unit. Can deploy Auto-Turret, Point Defense Drone, and Seeker Missile.

Detection unit

Mengsk Elite Battle Cruiser. This dominion capital ship is good at dealing with a large number of enemy units below it, and can fire Yamato guns and use defense matrices.

Can attack the ground and air.
Root.Name: Build Pride of Augustgrad

Behaviors.Tooltip: This structure's fire is being extinguished and is repairing itself to 50% of its maximum life.
